      • accept

                         boolean lazy)
        True if the given neighbour is to be be accepted
        Specified by:
        accept in class NeighbourSearch.NeighbourSearchContext
        Parameters:
        assignment - current assignment
        neighbour - proposed move
        model - problem model
        value - value of the generated move (i.e., its impact on the solution value)
        lazy - true if lazy move
        Returns:
        true if generated random number is below the generated probability
